title: More Amazing True Stories of Pepito The Squirrel
description: The Pepito The Squirrel books are based on the real life adventures of Pepito, who was injured when very young, and the retired physician who nurtured him back to good health."This was perhaps the finest care a squirrel without health insurance could receive in the United States." - The Boston GlobePepito's true story was documented in videos shared on social media. These caught the eye of a staff reporter of The Boston Globe. The article on the front page of The Boston Globe captivated readers from around the world!The True Tail Tale series is a collection of children's books. The stories are inspired by the author's relationship with various animals, both pets and wildlife. They are heartwarming and amusing stories told in rhyme. The beautiful illustrations are nicely paired with the poetic writing.The physician is both author and illustrator. He writes in third person to give his subjects center stage. His poetic writing is humorous and fanciful. The vibrant illustrations originate from actual photographs taken of his characters.
author: Federico Erebia
